channel.title: NoSQL on Steven Eckhoff

item.title: Focuser
item.description: Focuser was born out of a weekend project seeking to improve an existing app that I was using to manage Pomodoro sessions. Currently it will manage Pomodoro sessions for users and will track how much time they have stayed focused on a project. Focuser is being actively developed and more features will be arriving soon.
